column2: Critical bugs before − Critical bugs after

For example:
In January found 30 critical bugs. After improving 
process, number of critical bugs decreased to 26

column6: Процент багов высокого приоритета (Percentage of high priority bugs)

column2: Эффективность обнаружения дефектов (Defect Detection Efficiency, DDE)

column3: Number of defects found before release

column6: Процент багов Blocked/Critical (Percentage of bugs blocked and Critical severity)

column2: Время на исправление дефектов (Defect Fix Time)
